contents.text: Welcome to Dataminr in New York, delivering AI-powered alerts on critical events the moment they happen.
To reach our sales department, press 1.
For product information and demonstration requests, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales specialists for product information and a live demonstration.

navigationGoals: Book a live demonstration of the alert platform
I’d like a product demo to see how Dataminr’s AI alerts can help me monitor safety at veteran community events.
Schedule a live demo of the AI alert platform to evaluate its capabilities
I’d like someone to patiently walk me through a live product demonstration of your alert system.
I’d like to arrange a live demonstration of the Dataminr alert system for my university research group.

contents.text: For pricing and contract inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our sales team for pricing and contract assistance.

navigationGoals: Get pricing details and discuss contract options
Can you provide pricing details and contract options for a small nonprofit using your alert service?
Obtain detailed pricing and contract terms for enterprise licensing
I need clear information on pricing plans and contract terms before I decide.
I need information on student pricing tiers and contract terms for Dataminr services.

contents.text: To reach our support and account services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical issue with my alert integration
My API integration stopped delivering alerts—I need help troubleshooting the connection.
Resolve API integration errors with the alert system via technical support
I’m having trouble with the system and need technical support to fix it.
I'm experiencing issues connecting the Dataminr API to my analysis scripts and need technical support.

contents.text: For account management and client success, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to your account manager for client success services.

navigationGoals: Review my account setup and discuss success strategies with my manager
I need to update my billing information and discuss adding more user seats to my account.
Discuss account setup and onboarding to optimize client success
I need help reviewing and updating my account details and subscription.
I want to review and update my account details and usage limits with my account manager.
